name: Greek Pasta
description: This supper meal is best for the whole family or even if you have some visitors. ENJOY!!
steps: 1) In a large bowl, mix together all the ingredients for the dressing, give it a taste and adjust to your preference (add more oil if you think it's too sharp or more vinegar if you like it more tangy, I also prefer more garlic and mustard) then toss in the remaining ingredients, stir together well, cover and refrigerate a minimum of a couple hours before serving.
